title: [Champion Concept] Frosthaven, The Ice Dragon
body:
I remember Ao Shin's concept art and came up with ideas that seems kind of like some of those.

Frosthaven will an AD Caster with the range of 400 about. AD so he's not too much like Anivia, and 400range so he doesn't go bot lane ADC. He'd be more of an Mid Laner or Top Laner. I'd say mid due to no mobility in his kit. It actually does the opposite of that.. You'll see. c:
----------------------------------------
**Passive - Ice Dragon territory**
Turrets near Frosthaven shot's now slow the enemy.

**Q - Ice Tornado**
Frosthaven spawns a Tornado that pulls anyone in a 150radius of it and deals damage. If Frosthaven spawns the tornado directly on top of an enemy unit it will stun them and deals bonus damage. (100radius).

**W - Dragon's Frozen Breath**
Frosthaven shoots his minty ice breath in a straight line dealing damage to any enemy it hits. Any allies it hits gains resistance to slows. (Like how Swiftness boots work)

*Passive*
When Frosthaven is slowed, he gains bonus damage.

**E - GET AWAY**
Frosthaven yells "GET AWAY FROM ME" and spins Pushing back (So he doesn't work with Yasuo's ult) and dealing damage those he hits. If an enemy hits a wall while flying back he gets knock up for .5 seconds.

**R - Ice Dragon's Domain**
Frosthaven creates the entire map his domain for a duration, he slows every single unit on the field by about 15/20/25MS(Including him and his teammates) and gains vision over walls and in bushes if his vision can reach. His vision is also increased a bit.
-------------------------------------------
**Discussion**
I think he'd be best mid lane due to Mid Lane having slows and it's a shorter lane since he is immobile

Also he'd work best with teams that can afford MS lost.

Thoughts? :^)
